Email Conversation Export
=========================
Export Date: 2025-09-26 13:36:08

--------------------------------------------------
ID: CA8U2QO_00
From: Aaiza Zafar <Aaiza.Zafar@chalhoub.com>
To: 
CC: Nasser Alblooshi <Nasser.Alblooshi@chalhoub.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2025-05-16 11:18
Subject: Join us | Sustainability Week 2025 is here!
--------------------------------------------------






Dear Country Management Team,




Sustainability Week 2025 is here! Don’t forget to register and nudge your teams to join in too!










Sustainability Week 2025


We are proud to launch a week dedicated to action, awareness, and impact through a series of inspiring initiatives. From insightful talks and interactive workshops to community-driven activities, each event is designed to engage employees and promote meaningful contributions toward a more sustainable future.

 

Running from 19th to 23rd May, the program includes sustainability-themed games, fashion upcycling, biodiversity discussions, tree planting with POD players, blood donation drives, and more—hosted across key locations in Dubai.

 

Be part of the change. Explore the full schedule and register to join the initiatives that resonate with you. Let’s create impact together.

 

Register now - https://forms.office.com/r/F1Qzys3awC

 

 

 

 <https://forms.office.com/r/F1Qzys3awC>
